title: Wsbpooh
author: Wsbpooh
content: I need 10 usd in usdt erc20 address usdt erc20 : 0x67743F4691d261730527bD00E3555Ae6F3896C80

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You need?This is a currency exchange board. In exchange for what? Don't even think you will receive free money here if that is your intention.

comments.author: Wsbpooh
comments.body: Yes but you need me to give u something or whats let me do my job

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Wsbpooh on May 13, 2023, 11:49:18 AMYes but you need me to give u something or whats let me do my job But why?No, nobody has to give you anything for nothing! We would much rather pay you for your valuable services and expertise. After all, that is how the world works. So feel free to do your job and earn your keep, just like the rest of us. Nobody likes beggars.
